artist: Designer: Jack Larsen; Mill: Jack Lenor Larsen Inc.; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Twill weave, vertical and horizontal stripes in different colors that emphasize the twill pattern. Orange & yellow warp.Last 1" of warp is orange only. Yellow, tan & metallic copper weft. Twill. Right selvedge. Tag inside folder reads "Pomegranite, HUY/4A/, 50", wool, cotton, jute, Metlon" (orange, yellow, tan, copper metallic)
image_copyright: © Jack Lenor Larsen%2C Inc. %2F Pomegranate%2C Jack Larsen%2C 1953
medium: Wool, cotton, metlon (metallic?), jute. Woven fabric.
title: Pomegranate
